citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1030 am on
16-Nov-18.
Inspector arrived at 1030 am, knocked at facility door with no response, licensee contacted by phone and stated
she was no available for inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

16-Nov-18.
Inspector arrived at 1030 am, knocked at facility door with no response, licensee contacted by phone and stated
she was no available for inspection.
